entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: Wasm.Build.Tests.NativeBuildTests.MonoAOTCross_WorksWithNoTrimming #93522
  • CultureInfo.GetCultures returns nothing on iOS platforms with HybridGlobalization enabled #93514
  • [API Proposal]: Math float vectorized functions for Vector64/128/256/512 and Vector2/3/4 #93513
  • [AOT] Add support for compressing output file #93510
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/AssertionPropagation/ArrBoundElim/ArrBoundElim.dll #93508
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/ConstantFolding/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro.dll #93506
    8.0.0
  • Awaiting nongeneric Task.WhenAll changes behavior in .NET 8 to throw the last exception instead of the first #93504
  • Accessing folded conversion of string literals to UTF-8 from user code is problematic. #93501
    Future
  • Fix regression or document breaking change in BinaryReader #93500
    9.0.0
  • JIT: check-debug diffs in windows arm64 SPMI #93499
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator encounters namespace conflicts in using statements #93498
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add protected factory methods for creating Label and LocalBuilder in ILGenerator #93497
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Memory leak in ContextMenuStrip with ToolStripMenuItem submenus #93520
  • [NativeAOT] set StaticICULinking results in a CmakeLists.txt that violates policy CMP0000 of Cmake (affects CMake version >= 3.9.0) #93436
  • Unexpected results in LINQs ExceptBy #93512
  • Repo tag for v7.0.12 is for v7.0.11 #93328
  • IHostedService.StopAsync(...) not called when SIGTERM issued on ACA #91926
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround for #93442 #93523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize constant range tests #93521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Api append all bytes 84532 #93519
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Provide System.DirectoryServices.Protocols package readme #93518
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Provide System.Memory.Data package readme #93516
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Simplify surrogate handling logic in WebUtlity #93515
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93505
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/8.0] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93502
    area-System.Net.Sockets

Merged

  • Use Ascii transcoding APIs in more places in System.Net.Http #93511
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • (chore) set min version of cmake in native CmakeLists.txt to surpass Cmake CMP0000 policy warning #93437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Disable value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro #93507
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2291029 #93496
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Miscellaneous cleanup #93446
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve EH dead code elimination #93428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Make FailFast blocks cold (GS cookies) #93429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `add_link_options` and `target_link_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Adding Disabled Tests Skip Reason to their XML Results Log From issues.targets #93492
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] refactor entropy #93466
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Interpreter automatic PGO #92981
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • .NET CLI - If a runtime ID is passed through OS flag, a non-descriptive error message is returned #23433
    Backlog

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • rc2 tagged sdk cross build for ppc64le fails #36062
  • [NET 8.0 - RC2] Warning: Failed to read or parse localization file "C:\Program Files\.....\microsoft.dotnet.web.projecttemplates.8.0.8.0.0-rc.2.23480.2.nupkg ......... #36000
  • dotnet tool restore --interactive hangs forever #24220
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip workload integrity check on Linux and non-sudo #36123
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Enable users to install unlisted version of tool if specify the exact match of the version of the tool #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • When transforming web.config check if target framework is .NET Framework. #34618
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: New operator %% for canonical Modulus operations #7599

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect suggestion or fix 'Collection initialization can be simplified' for IAsyncEnumerable #70388
  • Interceptors feature doesn't work for VB - doc omission? gap? #70387
    17.9

Closed

  • Interfaces not in autocompletion list after generic type #70382
    17.9

PullRequests

Created

  • Add F1 help for `NameOf` keyword in Visual Basic #70386
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Faster checksum syncing for documents. #70385
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Include project-id in sync'ed data to allow future calls to directly jump to that project. #70343
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Suggest interfaces after generic type name #70383
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Simplify checksum caching code. #70346
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <constant>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<constant>)` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Simplify and improve performance of NameGenerator.EnsureUniqueness methods #70373
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve performance on SymbolCompletionProviderTests #70307
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Failed to load dotnet.js on InteractiveWebAssembly render mode #51384
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #51383
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51382
  • ConfigureTestContainer not being invoked #51381
  • Blazor forms should render target URL in action attribute as root-relative, not absolute #51380
  • [FromForm] in minimal API results in null when the class is using primary constructor and default constructor #51379
  • Server Layout used by RC2 Blazor Web App page inside Client project #51376
  • Support Blazor .Net 8 Microsoft.Identity.Web client for Azure clients #51374
  • Blazor .Net 8 RC2 templates contains insecure inline scripts #51373
  • Update BL0007 warning to explain why a parameter should be an auto-property and what to do #51372
  • Incorrect warning when classic blazor initializers are present #51370

Closed

  • System.TypeLoadException Could not load type Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI.Services.IEmailSender #51319
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext #51334
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #51375
  • Streaming+Enhanced nav can be wrong if asynchrony is very brief #51345
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use C# 12's collection expressions #51378
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Quarantine ResponseTests.HttpsConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate #51369
    area-networking

Merged

  • Fix streaming SSR timing issue #51333
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • [Fix-up] Track indicators of excessive stream resets #51306
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multiselection for Collectionview doesn't works on MacCatalyst #18028
  • Maui.Windows - Grid does not confine contents to row #18026
  • .NET MAUI Blazor survey #18022
  • Right way to dispose page with WebView #18021

Closed

  • Entry field does not get unfocused when you click on another element in the view. This works in Xamarin #18000
  • The .NET MAUI base template project doesn't compile because resizetizer is not loading in the images from the csproj #14422
    Backlog
  • Wrong DisplayName and EnglishName in CultureInfo on iOS #14148
  • [Android] Image.Source = ImageSource.FromResource() & ImageSource.FromStream() are not reliably integrating back with the MainThread #17857

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable more legacy tests #17931
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1

Updated

  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, Under Consideration
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExecuteUpdate with OnwsOne property in target table fails in efcore 7.0.12 #32053
  • IAsyncEnumerable query memory buildup from EfCore 8 RC2 #32052
  • Setting global collation for SQLite doesn't set collation for individual columns #32051
